text:
@MollyMcKew It is totally disgraceful that the POTUS, @realDonaldTrump, is listening to Jared Kushner regarding America’s response to the COVID-19 Pandemic and the number of ventilators New York needs. 

#TrumptheWorstPresidentEVER
